meanings.definition: The quality or state of being vesicular.
meanings.sent1: The vesicularity of the rock made it easy to identify.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the vesicularity of the volcanic ash.
meanings.sent3: The vesicularity of the foam made it look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement bubbled over with a vesicularity that was contagious.
meanings.sent5: The vesicularity of the bubbles in the soda was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The presence of vesicles or small sacs in a substance.
meanings.sent1: The vesicularity of the cells indicated a healthy sample.
meanings.sent2: The vesicularity of the liquid was a sign of fermentation.
meanings.sent3: The vesicularity of the soap bubbles made bath time fun.
meanings.sent4: The vesicularity of the packaging protected the fragile items inside.
meanings.sent5: The vesicularity of the foam mattress provided extra comfort.

meanings.definition: The property of having a vesicular texture or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The cake's vesicularity made it light and fluffy.
meanings.sent2: The vesicularity of the clouds signaled an incoming storm.
meanings.sent3: The vesicularity of the bread dough made it rise beautifully.
meanings.sent4: The vesicularity of the sponge soaked up the spilled water quickly.
meanings.sent5: The vesicularity of the lava rock gave it a unique texture.
